data.name: uri_from_bufnr
data.description:
Get a URI from a bufnr

                Parameters: ~
                    {bufnr}  (number): Buffer number

                Return: ~
                    URI

data.name: uri_from_fname
data.description:
Get a URI from a file path.

                Parameters: ~
                    {path}  (string): Path to file

                Return: ~
                    URI

data.name: uri_to_bufnr
data.description:
Return or create a buffer for a uri.

                Parameters: ~
                    {uri}  (string): The URI

                Return: ~
                    bufnr.

                Note:
                    Creates buffer but does not load it

data.name: uri_to_fname
data.description:
Get a filename from a URI

                Parameters: ~
                    {uri}  (string): The URI

                Return: ~
                    Filename

 vim:tw=78:ts=8:ft=help:norl:
